pages.text: Pedestals can be placed in all 6 directions. $(li)UP (Default when placed on the ground) $(li)DOWN (When placed on a Ceiling, or when placing a pedestal on top of an UP facing one. $(li)NORTH $(li)EAST $(li)SOUTH $(li)WEST

pages.title: Why Directional Placement?
pages.text: The 'Working Area' of an upgrade is based on the pedestals placement direction, For example, an upgrade with a 3x5x3 area: $(li)UP: No Changes $(li)Down: 3x-5x3 $(li)East: -5x3x3 $(li)West: 5x3x3 $(li)North: 3x3x-5 $(li)South: 3x3x5
